value.title: A uniform interface to run deep learning models from multiple frameworks
value.excerpt: Neuropod is a library that provides a uniform interface to run deep learning models from multiple frameworks in C++ and Python. Neuropod makes it easy for researchers to build models in a framework of their choosing while also simplifying productionization of these models.

value.title: US Air Force to test autonomous AI fighter against a human next year
value.excerpt: The USAF started an AI-drone project in 2018. The goal was to implement machine learning in a less sophisticated craft like the F-16 within 18 months. If successful, newer fighters such as the F-32 or F-22 would eventually be outfitted.

images.title: US Air Force to test autonomous AI fighter against a human next year
